frames.description: A black and white photo showing P. Ramlee in a formal suit having a discussion with several colleagues in casual attire.
Three men in traditional Malay clothing standing outdoors, appearing to be in conversation or performing.
P. Ramlee and a female companion at what appears to be an awards ceremony, both holding trophies and smiling.
A colorized photo showing P. Ramlee holding a young child, both smiling, with purple flowers visible in the background.
